text: Maria Jocelyn Valera Bernos is a Filipina politician from the province of Abra in the Philippines. She currently serves as the Governor of Abra. She was first elected as Governor of the province in 2016 and was re-elected in 2019. ==References== ==External links== *Province of Abra Official Website Category:Living people Category:1977 births Category:Governors of Abra (province) Category:Women provincial governors of the Philippines Category:National Unity Party (Philippines) politicians
title: Maria Jocelyn Bernos
